yutongz1997.auto2048.lib

Class Configurations

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • yutongz1997.auto2048.lib.Configurations

  • public class Configurations
extends java.util.Observable
    The class that stores all configurations / settings of the game / player.
    Author:
    Yutong Zhang

        Resets all the properties to their default values.

      • setBestRecord

        public void setBestRecord(java.lang.String bestPlayerName,
                          int bestScores)
        Changes the best player's record, i.e. his / her name and the scores to given name and scores, and save this change to the configuration file.
        Parameters:
        bestPlayerName - the new best player's name
        bestScores - the new best scores

      • setPlayerName

        public void setPlayerName(java.lang.String playerName)
        Changes the current player's name to a given new name, and save this change to the configuration file.
        Parameters:
        playerName - the player's new name

      • setSearchTreeLevel

        public void setSearchTreeLevel(int searchTreeLevel)
        Changes the level of the search tree to a given new one, and save this change to the configuration file.
        Parameters:
        searchTreeLevel - the new search tree level

      • setSleepTime

        public void setSleepTime(int sleepTime)
        Changes the current auto player's sleep time to a new one, and save this change to the configuration file.
        Parameters:
        sleepTime - the new sleep time between each move of the auto player
